backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing user profiles, vocabulary storage, access control checks, and CRUD-like operations for vocabulary and user initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented features, associated frontend files, components, and test references for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the application with the theme provider and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate that shows a marketing-style landing screen for unauthenticated users or renders children when logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button connected to Internet Identity with loading state management and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that lets users pick source and target languages, then saves the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Displays the app logo and optionally the LinguaLearn title depending on size.
frontend/src/components/branding/HeroIll: Shows a full‑width hero image illustration for the landing page.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Metric: Renders three dashboard metric cards for practice count, accuracy, and due items.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the overall page layout with top navigation, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with branding, route links, and user auth controls for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/practice/Practic: Interactive practice card handling answer submission, feedback generation, and navigation between questions.
frontend/src/components/practice/TutorPa: Displays detailed tutor feedback including correctness, hints, and suggestions.
frontend/src/components/user/UserBadge.t: Shows a small badge with the user's selected language pair using profile data.
frontend/src/components/vocabulary/Delet: Confirmation dialog for deleting a vocabulary item using a mutation with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/vocabulary/Vocab: Dialog form for adding or editing vocabulary items, handling state, validation, and mutation calls.
Displays searchable vocabulary cards with edit and delete actions and shows usage stats and tags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardMetrics.t: Computes dashboard metrics like accuracy, due item count, and daily practice count from profile and due items.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user profiles, vocabulary items, and practice results via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays dashboard metrics, practice and vocabulary actions, and handles profile setup and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PracticePage.tsx: Manages practice sessions by generating exercises, tracking progress, submitting results, and handling profile and vocabulary loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shows user profile settings including language preferences and account stats, with profile-setup and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/VocabularyPage.tsx: Provides vocabulary management with listing, adding, and editing items, along with profile setup and loading states.
frontend/src/types/practice.ts: Defines types for practice exercises and results including exercise structure and type variants.
frontend/src/utils/practice/generateExer: Generates randomized translation or fill‑in‑the‑blank exercises from vocabulary items.
frontend/src/utils/tutor/editDistance.ts: Implements Levenshtein distance and a helper to detect close‑match answers.
frontend/src/utils/tutor/feedback.ts: Produces detailed correctness feedback based on normalized answers, edit distance, and partial matches.
frontend/src/utils/tutor/normalize.ts: Normalizes text and checks answer equivalence by lowercasing, trimming, and removing diacritics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based color system, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata, required images, and a list of implemented features for the language‑learning web app.
